tasks.label: show-proactive-demo-sre-agent
args: az resource show -g rg-sre-proactive-demo -n sre-agent-proactive-demo --resource-type Microsoft.App/agents --query "{name:name, endpoint:properties.agentEndpoint, actionMode:properties.actionConfiguration.mode, accessLevel:properties.actionConfiguration.accessLevel, runningState:properties.runningState}" -o json

tasks.label: set-proactive-demo-sre-agent-autonomous
args: az resource update -g rg-sre-proactive-demo -n sre-agent-proactive-demo --resource-type Microsoft.App/agents --set properties.actionConfiguration.mode=Autonomous

tasks.label: set-proactive-demo-sre-agent-autonomous-with-appinsights
args: AI_APPID=$(az resource show -g rg-sre-proactive-demo -n sreproactive-vscode-39596-ai --resource-type microsoft.insights/components --query properties.AppId -o tsv) && AI_CS=$(az resource show -g rg-sre-proactive-demo -n sreproactive-vscode-39596-ai --resource-type microsoft.insights/components --query properties.ConnectionString -o tsv) && az resource update -g rg-sre-proactive-demo -n sre-agent-proactive-demo --resource-type Microsoft.App/agents --set properties.logConfiguration.applicationInsightsConfiguration.appId=$AI_APPID properties.logConfiguration.applicationInsightsConfiguration.connectionString=$AI_CS properties.actionConfiguration.mode=Autonomous
